All functions

finalize() get_p() get_log_p() get_n_frac() get_n_frac_range() get_n() get_rbf_range() get_batch_sizes()

Functions to finalize data-specific parameter ranges

grid_regular() grid_random()

Create grids of tuning parameters

merge(<model_spec>) merge(<param_grid>)

Merge parameter grid values into a parsnip object

weight_func surv_dist Laplace neighbors dist_power

Parameter objects related to miscellaneous models.

new_quant_param() new_qual_param()

Tools for creating new parameter objects

dropout epochs activation mixture penalty rbf_sigma prod_degree num_terms num_comp cost scale_factor margin degree deg_free hidden_units batch_size

Parameter objects related to parametric models.

range_validate() range_get() range_set()

Tools for working with parameter ranges

mtry mtry_long trees min_n sample_size learn_rate loss_reduction tree_depth prune Cp

Parameter objects related to tree- and rule-based models.

unknown() is_unknown() has_unknowns()

Placeholder for unknown parameter values

value_validate() value_seq() value_sample() value_transform() value_inverse() value_set()

Tools for working with parameter values

dials is a part of the tidymodels ecosystem, a collection of modeling packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy.
